Notes: If the player touches this object's center while riding a Star Ball, it will pull the Star Ball towards its center and the Star Ball will be launched along its assigned path.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that the Star Ball will move on.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
